ModMetaData.name: Range Makes Sense Now
ModMetaData.author: Jdalt
ModMetaData.description:
Ever wondered why Billy, despite having the shooting skill of a toddler tossing their broccoli, is still able to target pawns from 26 cells away with a pistol? This mod fixes that by having your max range be determined by your consciousness, sight, and shooting skill!
REQUIRES VANILLA EXPANDED FRAMEWORK
